About.title: About
About.subtitle: Kryfal
About.description: Experts in Threat Intelligence and digital investigations, protecting companies from advanced cyber threats. Kryfal was born from an observation: sectors forming the backbone of the economy are often neglected in cyber intelligence. While the market focuses on generic threats, we dive into the specific ecosystems of Agribusiness, Ports, Aerospace, and the new Web3 economy, delivering intelligence managers can use to make strategic decisions and protect their most valuable assets.

Posicionamento.title: Our Positioning
Posicionamento.description: Effective threat intelligence cannot exist without deep business knowledge. Kryfal positions itself at the intersection of cyber expertise and the operational reality of critical sectors. Instead of offering generic solutions, we dive into your value chain to understand who the threat actors are, how they think, and how they operate—those who truly compromise business continuity.

brand_protection.title: Corporate Counterintelligence
brand_protection.description: Protect your business from the inside out with investigative intelligence for high-confidence decisions.
brand_protection.list_title2: Your operation’s integrity directly depends on the robustness of your supply chain—including both external suppliers and internal human capital. Failure to rigorously verify even a single link, whether a critical logistics partner or a newly hired executive, can introduce vulnerabilities across the structure.
brand_protection.list_title3: Superficial credential checks and purely financial audits are insufficient to detect the most harmful risks: premeditated fraud, conflicts of interest, hidden legal and reputational liabilities. Hiring or partnering without prior background analysis means managing your business based on an incomplete and dangerous view of your partners’ operational and ethical reality.
listItems: Your company may have access to security feeds and even Deep Web alerts, but how do you connect the dots?
How to translate a technical indicator into a real business risk?
How to ensure the right person—from SOC analyst to CEO—receives the correct intelligence, in the right format and at the right time to act?
brand_protection.list_description: Information without context is just noise.

SectionServiceSecond.title: Our Deliverables
SectionServiceSecond.description: Protect your business from the inside out with investigative intelligence for high-confidence decisions.

card1.title: Precision
card1.description: Third-Party Due Diligence: We thoroughly investigate potential partners, suppliers, or M&A targets. We map corporate structures, reputational and legal history of partners (KYP - Know Your Partner), and identify hidden liabilities or involvement in illicit activities.

card2.title: Expertise
card2.description: Background Check (Profile Analysis): We conduct deep checks on candidates and key personnel. We analyze professional history, legal processes, digital reputation, and potential conflicts of interest to ensure team integrity and reliability.

card3.title: Excellence
card3.description: Fraud Investigation and Response: We investigate suspected fraud, corruption, asset theft, and internal sabotage. We collect evidence methodically, identify those involved, and provide detailed reports to support administrative and legal actions.

card4.title: Internal Risks
card4.description: Internal Risk and Conflict Mapping: We analyze your employees’ ecosystem and connections to identify undeclared relationships with competitors, suspicious side activities, and other risk factors that traditional audits do not reveal.
